name: Julian Reed Wiser
headline: Researcher • Applied Psychology • EMT • Digital Director • Artist
about: BS Applied Psychology (NYU Steinhardt, 2025). EMT and PTCB-certified pharmacy technician. Research focus on neurodiverse children’s emotional and learning experiences in therapeutic settings (Nordoff-Robbins). Digital director/webmaster for NYU Psi Chi. Independent artist/producer under Yung Frown with a 150+ track catalog. Building clean systems that actually help people instead of just looking pretty.
credentials: PTCB Certified Pharmacy Technician (valid to Feb 2027)
IBM Coursera: Applied Data Science, Data Analysis & Visualization, Python for Data Science, Machine Learning with Python, Generative AI for Software Developers, Full-Stack Software Development
